title: Gerardo Romero
text: Gerardo Romero (born 1906, date of death unknown) was a <a href="Paraguay">Paraguay</a>an <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who played for <a href="Paraguay%20national%20football%20team">Paraguay</a> in the <a href="1930%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1930 FIFA World Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="Club%20Libertad">Club Libertad</a>.
